question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. Benz sign
B. woman in purple dress
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The woman in the purple dress is seated in the stands behind the player, while the Mercedes-Benz sign is on the wall behind the player, but the woman is clearly further back in the seating area than the sign, which is closer to the foreground.
